channel.title: Inventory on INFINI Console
channel.description: Recent content in Inventory on INFINI Console

item.title: Gateway Management
item.description: Gateway Management # Gateway management can quickly and easily help us manage multiple gateway instances. Gateway list # The created gateway can be queried in the gateway list Gateway registration # The first step is to fill in the gateway address, and enable TLS and authentication as needed (you need to input a user name and password after enabling authentication). The second step is to confirm the information, and modify the gateway name, tags, and description, as needed.

item.title: Cluster Management
item.description: Cluster Management # Introduction # Cluster management can quickly and easily help us manage multiple Elasticsearch clusters across versions. Cluster list # The registered Elasticsearch cluster can be queried in the cluster list Cluster registration # The first step is to fill in the cluster address, and enable TLS and authentication as needed (you need to input a user name and password after enabling authentication). The second step is to confirm the information
